node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `nodenote` ( `nodenote_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `timestamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `notetext` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `nodenote_nodeid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `noter_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`nodenote_id`), KEY `timestamp` (`timestamp`), KEY `nodenote_nodeid` (`nodenote_nodeid`), KEY `noter_user` (`noter_user`), KEY `nodenote_nodeid__noter_user` (`nodenote_nodeid`,`noter_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
node.title: nodenote
